snippet: The British construction and services company said that Carillion was still insisting that the Balfour-owned consulting business, Parsons Brinckerhoff, not be sold; the dispute had also derailed merger talks last month.
abstract: The British construction and services company said that Carillion was still insisting that the Balfour-owned consulting business, Parsons Brinckerhoff, not be sold; the dispute had also derailed merger talks last month.

headline.main: Balfour Beatty Rejects New Carillion Merger Effort
